title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing strange insects in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of strange insects in a dream Insects of all kinds in our lives are things that we do not like and most of us feel disgusted as soon as we see them. Many people are afraid when they see some insects such as cockroaches and ants, which are traditional insects that we all see time. Therefore, when we see strange creatures that are unknown to us, we feel afraid of them, and when we dream about them, we have many questions about whether they are good omens or bad news, and strange insects in a dream have many different interpretations that vary from one case to another. According to the state of insight, in the following article we will present in detail all the cases and their effects: Interpretation of strange insects in a dream: Seeing strange insects in a dream refers to humans and jinn and symbolizes the presence of demons. Seeing insects attacking the dreamer in a dream means that he has gotten rid of a major disaster that he was going through at that time and will find Solutions to some of the problems he faces in his life. Interpretation of strange insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted strange insects in a dream as bad news, because they symbolize the appearance of some unpleasant things for the pioneer and surrounded him with many opponents who wish him to fail and take him away from all the things that Make him successful and happy. person. Unidentified insects in the dreamer’s dream indicate the people around him who question his decisions and shake his confidence so that he cannot achieve his desires. Interpretation of strange insects in a dream for a single woman. A girl who sees strange insects in her dream means that she will face many problems in her life and it will affect her psychological state in a way. Negative and she will be surrounded by sadness. Seeing strange insects in a girl’s dream symbolizes her marriage to a person who does not suit her, with whom she lives a miserable life, and this relationship will not be crowned with success, but on the contrary, it will fail and be unhappy. Him. Insects that harm a woman in her dream are a sign that there are many bad friends next to her who are planning to harm her. In the event that the dreamer is able to resist and escape from strange insects in a dream, this indicates her superiority in her life and the achievement of many goals that she plans to achieve. If the dreamer sees Strange insects in her dream that bite her, this means that there is another woman who shares the love of the person with whom she has a relationship. An unmarried woman’s dream of having lice in her hair indicates that she is a righteous person who has good morals and a good relationship with God Almighty and his closeness to Him. Interpretation of a dream about strange black insects for a woman Single: A dream about strange black insects in an unmarried girl’s dream has many praiseworthy and undesirable meanings, which vary from one case to another depending on the dreamer’s condition, and we will explain that below: Seeing an unmarried girl carrying black insects in her dream means that she has entered a period of worries and sorrows. She will encounter many difficulties, but if she can escape from them, this means that she has overcome all problems and crises. Which deals with.Interpretation of strange insects in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees strange insects in her dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream: You married your ex-lover. Dream of marrying an old lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lover by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing an ex-lover in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing a lover after partingI dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to meInterpretation of a dream about the return of your loved one after separationInterpretation of a dream about a lover more than onceI dreamed of my old friendInterpretation of a dream about a first loverIf you see in a dream that you married your ex-lover, this means that you have turned a page This relationship is in your life and it has become a memory from the past for you. But at the same time, you have learned from all the mistakes you made in this relationship. If you are currently in a relationship, the dream may mean that there are some things in common between your relationship with your ex-lover and your current lover. Anyway In any case, this dream is good and guarantees that you will not make the same mistakes of the past again. Interpretation of a dream about an ex-lover - YouTube

title: Interpretation of dreams about someone holding me from my back in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of someone holding me by the back in a dream. We can search for the interpretation of a dream of someone holding me by the back in a dream. It is one of the interpretations that some people want to know what the meaning of this dream is and whether it is a sign of good or evil. The site has conveyed some interpretations, and diligent scholars have tried to reach the truth of the dream and its interpretation. Well, it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a policeman in a dream: Seeing a person being arrested by a policeman may indicate some family disputes and problems that he faces during this time. In the event that he is arrested by a policeman, this may indicate some financial crises that The dreamer suffers from it during those days. In the event that the person believes that he has been arrested by a policeman, this can indicate some obstacles that the dreamer faces in his scientific and professional life. It is possible to see a policeman arresting a person in a dream, which indicates some fear that he felt. What the dreamer experiences during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about catching a snake’s head in a dream Catching a snake’s head in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s ability to achieve success and ambitions. A dream about catching a snake’s head in a dream may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome with God’s grace. If he sees If someone grabs the head of a snake, this may indicate victory over an enemy who was close to him. And if a person sees the head of a snake and grabs it, this may indicate rejection of the great abuse that surrounded the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of someone grabbing me from My back in a dreamAnyone who sees in a dream that someone grabbed me from behind, can indicate his diligence and struggle in life. A dream of someone grabbing me from behind in a dream may indicate the peace and calm that the dreamer felt at that time. In the event that someone sees that Someone has grabbed him from his back, this may indicate his desire to get rid of problems and fears from his life at that time. Seeing a person who has grabbed him from behind can mean that he is free from life’s problems and the beginning of a new page, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in a dream: If If one sees that he is holding the Qur’an, this may indicate the blessing and nourishment he receives in this period. Seeing someone holding the Qur’an may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. Seeing yourself holding the Qur’an in a dream may indicate the tremendous livelihood that he will gain. The dreamer during this period. If a person sees himself carrying the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about arresting a thief in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he has arrested a thief, may indicate some The problems that the dreamer faces in his life on those days. Dreaming of catching a thief in a dream may indicate the arrival of the dreamer’s desires and goals. Anyone who dreams of arresting a thief may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome and must seek God’s help. And in the event that one sees that he has been caught A thief, this may indicate his recovery from illness and freedom from pain at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a thief.

title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in clear water

preview.html: When a person sees in his dream a dream of swimming in clear water, it can bring a feeling of joy and happiness, but the interpretation of such dreams can depend on the person’s ability to swim, the parts of swimming and those that accompany the swimming process, so all their interpretations will be listed and remain with us. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in clear water in a dream: When someone dreams in a dream that he is swimming in clear water, this can be evidence that the dreamer has been liberated from all the darkness that surrounds him and the illusion that was controlling his life at that time. And when one sees in His dream is swimming in clear water, it means that this person has abandoned all the sins, disobedience and misdeeds he was doing, and God knows best. When a person sees in a dream that he is swimming in clear water, it may be a sign of a good and calm emotional relationship. If one sees In his dream that he is swimming in clear water, this may be an indication that he is going through a period of purity and peace. It also represents the end of a period that was full of problems and crises, and then enters a new phase full of stability and peace. When a person sees in a dream that he is swimming in clean water, he may This is an affirmation of the purity of days or eternity. When a person sees in a dream that he is swimming in clear water, this may mean the marriage of an unmarried girl in his house to a man of justice and piety. If someone dreams that he is swimming in clear water, this is a sign of stability and balance. Psychological or spiritual in this person’s life. When a person sees in a dream that he is swimming in clear water, this can be a sign of the purity of his heart and the purity of his soul. If a woman dreams that she is swimming in clear water, this may mean that there is a lot of pure love in Her life. When a person sees in his dream that he is swimming in clear water, this may mean that he obtains halal money and it also shows the abundance of halal money if he is a merchant or businessman. Interpretation of swimming in a dreamWhen a person sees that he is swimming in clear water in a dream, it could be This is an indication of the psychological state of the person who sees it. If a person sees in his dream that he is swimming in clear and pure water and he swims easily and smoothly. This can confirm that the viewer lives in a state of psychological stability and feels calm. If he sees that he is swimming in impure water filled with dirt. This may be an indication that the dreamer feels that he is living in a state of anxiety and fear and also suggests that he has gone through some crises in his life. If a person dreams that he is swimming in a pond, its water is full of mud, dirt, and plankton. This may indicate that he is facing failure in something, as it indicates However, he will be exposed to some crises, problems, and heartaches in the coming period of his life, and God knows best. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of swimming in the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams of swimming in the sea for a single woman. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is swimming in the sea and the water is clean. This may be a sign that she She will receive an engagement in the near future from someone who loves her and loves her, God willing. When you see an unmarried woman

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the sea and floating in itInterpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream is one of the things and visions that a very large group of people are searching for at that time, because of the multiple ways in which you can see the sea.Interpretation of a dream about seeing the seaInterpretation of seeing the sea by Ibn SirinIf one sees that he is taking an amount of water To the sea and then transfer it to a large ship, this means that this person will receive a large sum of money soon. If one sees in a dream that this sea is like a stick on which he leans, this means that he will be able to reach a position in which he cooperates with the landowner, but This person must be more careful than before due to participating in this project. If one sees that the sea water has decreased to the point that the bottom has become visible to the man standing in front of him, this indicates that this city will soon suffer from drought and extreme poverty. Interpretation of seeing the sea in A dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about the sea shows her ability to achieve many things that she has dreamed of for a long time, and this will make her in a state of great happiness and satisfaction. If the dreamer sees the sea during his sleep, this is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money that will enable him To live his life as she desires. If the dreamer sees the sea in her dream, this means that she has received an offer of marriage from someone who suits her well and she will agree to it immediately and will be very happy in her life with him. The dreamer seeing in her dream about the sea symbolizes positive things that will happen from Around her, which will be very satisfying to her and make her very happy. If a girl sees the sea in her dream and gets engaged, this is a sign that the date of her marriage to her fiancé is approaching and she will begin a completely new phase in her life without any disturbance. What is the interpretation of seeing a raging sea in a single woman’s dream? Seeing an unmarried woman Married woman in a dream about a raging sea indicates that there are many problems she is facing in her life at that time and her inability to solve them bothers her a lot. If the dreamer sees during her sleep the raging sea, this is a sign of her inability to reach any of the things she dreamed of because There are many obstacles that prevent her from doing so. If the dreamer sees the raging sea in her dream, this means that she is in a very serious problem that she will not be able to get rid of in any way. For the dreamer to see the raging sea in her dream symbolizes the presence of many people who have very malicious intentions. towards her and they are planning something bad for her and she must be careful to be safe from their evils. If a girl sees the raging sea in her dream, this is a sign that she will commit many wrong things that will lead to her serious death if she does not stop her immediately. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a woman Married Woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream at the sea is a sign of good things that will happen in her life, which will make her feel very good and improve her psychological state greatly. If the dreamer sees the sea during her sleep, this is a sign that she will get many things that she dreamed of.

title: Interpretation of a dream about vinegar

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a dream: Interpretations differed in interpreting a dream about vinegar in a dream. But in general, seeing vinegar in a dream without drinking it is a vision of goodness and brings happiness, and you may also be interested in knowing a sick person in a dream. As for most dream interpreters, they say that drinking vinegar in a dream often causes problems and concerns unless its taste is not spicy. In this article, we will shed light on the interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a dream. Seeing a man in a dream many bottles of vinegar is an indication of the abundance of food and abundant money that he will obtain. So. Seeing the dreamer in a dream eating bread with vinegar, and its taste is good, means that he will receive a blessing in his livelihood and money. Seeing the dreamer in a dream drinking vinegar and its spicy taste indicates family problems and a major dispute that will occur and end in a fight. Seeing the fortuneteller in a dream that he is eating bread with white vinegar Evidence that the dreamer is looking for halal money. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a sick unmarried woman drinking vinegar in a dream is a sign that she will find a cure for her illness and will be cured, God willing. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with expired vinegar, It means major problems in her life that affect her happiness for a period of time. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with a large number of bottles of vinegar and not drinking from them is evidence of her steadfastness and success in forming good and strong social relationships. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she was drinking vinegar and felt pain In her stomach, it means great sadness and serious problems that she will face. For an unmarried woman to see in a dream that a friend gives her a bottle of vinegar and she drinks from it, it means that problems come to her because of her friend. For an unmarried woman to see in a dream that she drinks vinegar with her fiancé is an indication that she has chosen The wrong person as her life partner and she should not continue this engagement and relationship. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream giving her husband sour vinegar means that she quarrels with him a lot and the differences between them may lead to divorce. If she dreams For a married woman, her husband forces her to drink hot vinegar, then this is a sign of sadness and sorrow for the dreamer. However, if a married woman sees in a dream that she is drinking vinegar and it tastes sweet, then this indicates happiness and reassurance in her life, and she will be able to get rid of major problems in her married life. Seeing a married woman in The dream is that she bought many bottles of vinegar and she is happy, this indicates news that will make her happy, such as pregnancy or abundant nutrition. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a pregnant woman’s dream Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream purifying herself with vinegar is evidence that she is envied and God will remove from her This envy protects her fetus. A pregnant woman sees in a dream that she drank pungent vinegar and felt pain in her stomach

Seeing a married woman in a dream giving her husband sour vinegar means that she quarrels with him a lot and the differences between them may lead to divorce. If she dreams For a married woman, her husband forces her to drink hot vinegar, then this is a sign of sadness and sorrow for the dreamer. However, if a married woman sees in a dream that she is drinking vinegar and it tastes sweet, then this indicates happiness and reassurance in her life, and she will be able to get rid of major problems in her married life. Seeing a married woman in The dream is that she bought many bottles of vinegar and she is happy, this indicates news that will make her happy, such as pregnancy or abundant nutrition. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of a dream about vinegar in a pregnant woman’s dream Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream purifying herself with vinegar is evidence that she is envied and God will remove from her This envy protects her fetus. A pregnant woman sees in a dream that she drank pungent vinegar and felt pain in her stomach

title: Interpretation of seeing fog in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fog in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. When resorting to the interpretation of a dream of fog in a dream, it is best to remember all the details of the dream, since the interpretation of dreams for each symbol of observations and events has different elements from the other elements, so you should not underestimate the importance of any symbol or Any hadith that occurred in your dream to obtain the correct interpretation, and in the context of this hadith we find the interpretation of seeing fog in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of a dream of clouds and thick fog in a dream Commentators unanimously agree that a person who sees fog in his dream is a sign of anxiety, sadness, and problems that he suffers from. Person: The presence of thick fog indicates that a person has committed a great sin and feels remorse for this sin. Seeing a lot of fog in a dream indicates the loss of many opportunities that the dreamer cannot make up for. Also, seeing thick fog is a sign of fears and problems that he faces. The person. If a person sees in his dream that he is working to remove fog, this is a sign that he will be free from worries and problems. When a person sees in a dream that he cannot breathe due to the presence of fog, this indicates anxiety and poverty. A person who sees in a dream clouds and clouds that do not exist Fog, then this indicates knowledge, sustenance, and travel. Also, red and yellow fog in a dream indicates disturbances or illness, and black fog is a sign of ignorance. If one sees fog in his dream, this may be an invitation to get back on the right path. If a pregnant woman sees fog in Her dream, this means that she is constantly thinking about the health of her fetus. It also indicates her fear of the experience of childbirth. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Haila in detail by the most famous interpreters. Seeing light fog for a married woman in a dream. Fog in a dream has different interpretations. There are those who interpreted it as worries and problems, There are those who interpreted it as evidence of kindness: There are those who interpreted fog as internal battles that a person goes through. Likewise, seeing a person shows the worries that a person falls into. Also, if a person sees dense fog, this indicates the presence of someone who wants to deceive him. Seeing a person walking in the middle of The fog shows the obstacles he faces in his life. Also, when you see yourself emerging from the fog, this indicates repentance and staying away from illusions. In addition, the black fog indicates the problems that hinder his life, but he will overcome them. Also, seeing the thick fog covering the sky It is a sign of a person straying from the path of truth. Also, a woman’s vision of fog is evidence of the psychological pressures she is experiencing, as well as the problems she faces. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing swimming in the sea in a dream. Seeing dust and fog in a dream. Fog occurs noticeably in the winter. Dust and fog are associated with poor visibility and traffic accidents: A person who sees thick fog in his dream indicates that he will be robbed or defrauded. If a person walks in fog, this means that he has overcome many of the many problems he faces.

title: Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream: It is one of the good visions that has many repercussions. For example, seeing lightning in a dream means recovering and recovering from illness, because lightning in reality is a process that occurs when many clouds collide. Who has forensic science so that the interpretation is not done incorrectly or the interpretation is done by people who rely on fraud, and therefore the interpretation is inaccurate, which leads to some problems due to its reliance on an incorrect dream interpretation. God knows best. Read also: Palaces and fruits of Paradise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream. A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream. Landmarks of dream interpretation. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream is, if the vision is lightning illuminating the sky, then this is the human happiness that the dreamer enjoys and this vision can indicate success or marriage. As for the man who sees lightning in Dreaming, this indicates success, as it is money and work. Moreover, Ibn Sirin believes that lightning in a dream expresses the perseverance and personal strength that the dreamer has in facing life. Read also: Toilet in a dream Seeing lightning in a single woman’s dream An unmarried girl sees lightning In a dream, this is a good dream that heralds happiness and joy, and we wish you success - God willing. Just like the girl who sees lightning in a dream with rain, this is one of the dreams that indicates that this girl will be able to achieve the goals she seeks - God willing. As for Seeing lightning in an unmarried girl’s dream without rain, and the girl in the dream feels anxious and afraid, is one of the dreams that heralds happy events for her - God willing. Seeing lightning in a married woman: A married woman sees lightning in a dream and feels happy, so this dream foretells her that she will succeed in life. God willing - just like a married woman seeing lightning, this bodes well for her and she will be able to achieve some of the security she wants - God willing -. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing lightning in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees lightning in her dream indicates a painful past, It could also be one of the dreams that reassures the pregnant woman that she will give birth without any problems - God willing. Also, lightning in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth - God willing - a boy and that she will enjoy health and well-being - God willing - and God knows best. Seeing lightning In a dream for a man: A man who sees lightning in a dream, this is one of the good dreams that heralds to the man the good news that he will receive during the coming period. Lightning in a man’s dream also indicates the positive energy that the man has in life and the ability to face various challenges. Also, lightning in a dream for a man It symbolizes the ability to achieve victory and achieve victory - God willing -. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing lightning in a dream Seeing lightning in a dream indicates that the dreamer is facing a set of problems, such as a traveler seeing lightning in a dream, this dream is a warning to him that there are some problems. title: Interpretation of seeing white roses and dreaming of a white rose

preview.html: White roses in a dream symbolize psychological comfort and joy in life, and a dream of picking white roses indicates happiness and understanding with your partner, and treating him well, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing white roses in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a white rose in a dream as a pure and chaste woman. Seeing white roses in a dream symbolizes psychological comfort and joy in life. A dream can mean purity of the soul, comfort and happiness in life, and dreaming of white flowers indicates money and abundant food, and whoever sees that he is picking a white rose in a dream will gain pleasure and joy in his life, and seeing white roses in a dream indicates purity of intentions and bed. A white rose bush in a dream indicates To Nutrition and Children: Whoever sees that he is in a grove of white roses in a dream, this is evidence of overwhelming joy and sweetness for the dreamer, and a dream of a sting from white roses indicates the evil that befalls the dreamer. From his wife or lover. A dream in which a white rose turned black indicates a change in luck for the worse, and if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is carrying white roses and they turn red, then this is evidence of a change in the wife’s morals, and seeing the color of white roses turns red. Yellow in a dream indicates the illness of the wife or fiancé. Al-Nabulsi said that seeing white roses in a dream means the arrival of the absent person and the return of the traveler... meeting a beautiful virgin girl. Seeing white roses in a dream indicates entering into a state of turmoil, and if the dreamer sees that he is throwing white roses in his dream If he breaks up with his partner or leaves his wife, and sees a white rose running through his feet in a dream, it shows the woman’s oppression and wrongdoing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about white roses for a single woman: Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried girl sees white roses in a dream, this is evidence of peace and comfort in her life after a conflict with others. A dream about white flowers for a single woman may indicate that she is thinking about someone and admires him, and many roses symbolize White roses in a dream indicate the return of a former fiancé or a traveling brother. A dream of picking white roses for an unmarried woman indicates her happiness in life and work, and if an unmarried girl sees that she is picking white roses from a tree in a dream, this is evidence that she is obtaining good advantages and characteristics from others. Dreaming of a bouquet of white roses for individuals indicates multiple sources of income if the flowers are open to relationships with others with kind words and good deeds. Eating white roses in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is taking advantage of her fame to earn a living. Seeing a garden of white roses in a dream For an unmarried woman, it shows people who have love and kindness around her, and if an unmarried girl sees that she smells white roses in a dream, then she experiences the treatment of people around her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing white roses in a dream for a married woman: A dream of white roses for a married woman indicates her happiness. In her life and her relationship with her husband improves, the end of the mish

title: Interpretation of a dream about an eyebrow falling out in a dream

preview.html: Ibn Shirin’s dream of falling eyebrows. Interpretation of dreams. Falling of eyebrows. It refers to the bad doctrines that some give fatwas in religion. If the dreamer is close to God Almighty and sees in his dream an eyebrow falling, then this indicates a good ending that the dreamer will have, and it also indicates good deeds. Interpretation of a dream of falling out Eyebrows for a single woman: If a girl sees in a dream that her eyebrows are long and starting to fall out, this indicates the fears and problems she faces. It can also refer to the falling out of the eyebrow about the sad news that she will hear soon. If she sees that the eyebrows are very long and the hair is falling out in small quantities, this indicates livelihood. Which this girl will come up with. As for seeing the eyebrow drawn, which has a beautiful shape, this indicates marriage in the near future. Dream of a married woman’s eyebrows falling out. For a married woman to see in a dream that the eyebrows are moving away from each other, this indicates the problems she faces with her husband. And her suffering in married life with him. As for the woman who sees in a dream that the eyebrows fall in the same eye, this indicates the approach of pregnancy. If he sees thick hair on the eyebrows, this indicates wealth and abundance of money. An eyebrow falling from a man in a dream. Autumn dream. The eyebrow in a man’s dream is a sign of Fatigue and illness. Seeing eyebrows in a man’s dream can indicate positive aspects in his life, but if he sees the eyebrows falling out, this indicates some problems that he faces. As for eyebrow hair falling out of a man’s eye in a dream, this indicates that God will bless him with a new baby soon and hear News of his wife’s pregnancy. If an unmarried young man sees his eyebrow hair falling out, this means that he will get married soon and will be with a girl who suits him well and is characterized by fairness. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
